Name: Robo-Boy  Risky Venture
About the game: The Robo-Boy Risky Venture lets you become a little robot on a treasure hunt. Collect various jewels scattered across the levels, dodge the shots of evil plants, beware of sharp thorns and abysses! Only an attentive, dexterous and careful player will be able to collect all the valuables and get to the last level, will you succeed? Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack by DavidKBD
